long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate chatGPT chatbots from any website content, private or public. 

ChatShape lets you create chatbots in seconds from the text content on any web page. 

Want to make a chatbot that can answer questions about your private wikis like confluence, notion, or quip? 

Want to create a chatbot that can answer questions from customers on your website? Just install chatshape and in seconds you'll have a bot trained on your own content, you can then embed that chatbot on your own website!

How it works:

First, install the extension and login on chatshape.com

Then Visit any website, even a private one like your quip or google docs, and open the popup to create a new bot. Click "Add to Sources" on multiple pages that you want the bot to train on the text from.

Then, just click "generate bot from sources" and you will get a shareable link on chatshape.com where you can go to chat to your newly created chatGPT bot! You can share this link with your coworkers or friends.
